articles.content: Samsung will likely release refreshed Galaxy Books in May this year. These include a Galaxy Book Pro powered by 11th gen Intel Tiger Lake CPUs and a Galaxy Book Go, which is said to feature a new Gen… [+2308 chars]

articles.author: Eddie Makuch
articles.title: WoW Classic's Success "Surprised" Blizzard, Dev Thought It Would Only Appeal To Core Fans - GameSpot
articles.description: WoW Classic has become a huge hit and Blizzard can now boast it has the two most popular MMOs on the planet.
articles.content: When Blizzard announced World of Warcraft Classic, the developer had no idea it would become the hit that it is now. The developer thought bringing back the OG WoW would be something appealing to har… [+2639 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Hidden code points to in-display face unlock, fingerprint scanner for Pixel 6 5G - PhoneArena
articles.description: Hidden code discovered in the Settings app belonging to the Android 12 Developer Preview 1 reveals that the Pixel 6 could feature an in-display Face Unlock and an in-display fingerprint scanner.
